title: Calories in a 20-Piece McNugget
meta_description: Learn calories in a 20 piece mcnugget from McDonald's, with full nutrition facts including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for sauces or alternatives.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's breaded, fried Chicken McNuggets; approximately 17 g each; no dipping sauces or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and portion size. Check McDonald's official app or website for the most current values.

quick_answer.text: A 20-piece Chicken McNugget serving contains 880 calories and 46 g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (lower oil absorption)
Add one BBQ sauce packet for the serving

faqs.q: How many calories in a 20 piece mcnugget?
faqs.a: Approximately 880 calories for a standard McDonald's 20-piece serving.

faqs.q: How much protein is in 20 Chicken McNuggets?
Are there a lot of carbs in a 20-piece McNugget?
faqs.a: Yes, around 56 g from the breading, with 4 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in one McNugget?
faqs.a: About 88 mg per piece, or 1760 mg for 20 pieces.

faqs.q: How do dipping sauces affect calories in McNuggets?
faqs.a: One BBQ sauce packet adds ~45 kcal; choose low-cal options to keep totals down.
